title: Cuban slow cooker chicken
ingredients: ['1 large onion, chopped', '6 cloves garlic, chopped', '1/2 green pepper, chopped', '8 small whole peeled potatoes', '250g passata', '125ml dry white wine', '1/2 tablespoon cumin', '1 leaf fresh sage', 'salt and pepper to taste', '900g chicken legs and thighs']
